head.supplied: The Society for Geography and Related Sciences of Darmstadt certifies by this diploma that Dr Ferdinand Mueller of Melbourne has been admitted as a corresponding member of this Society. Darmstadt, 11 ...

div.p: From the Verein für Erdkunde und Verwandte Wissenshaften zu Darmstadt
RB MSS M197, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a certificate with an ornate border.

div.p: Herr Dr. Ferdinand Müller in Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: als correspondirendes Mitglied des Vereins aufgenommen worden ist.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Der z. Präsident Dr G. Lauteschläger.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
The Society for Geography and Related Sciences of Darmstadt certifies by this diploma that Dr Ferdinand Mueller of Melbourne has been admitted as a corresponding member of this Society. Darmstadt, 11 January 1862.
The certificate was not sent to M until some months after this date; see L. Ewald to M, 6 April 1862.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: President at the time Dr G. Lauteschläger

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Secretary at the time L. Ewald
